title: Contact
About Me
Pooja S Sukhdeve
text:
Computer Science Graduate Student · Data Scientist · Developer



Hi, I’m Pooja Sukhdeve — a passionate Computer Science graduate student at Boston University, with 5+ years of hands-on experience in software development, web development, and data analytics. I specialize in building scalable, accessible, and user-centric solutions. I’m proficient in Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, and I’m skilled at transforming complex data into actionable insights using visualization tools like Tableau and SHAP.


My journey includes developing accessible learning modules for visually impaired users, leading award-winning hackathon teams, and contributing to both academic research and innovative industry projects. I love collaborating across disciplines to solve real-world problems with code and data.



 


<h1 style="font-size:2.3rem; font-weight:800; color:#29335c; margin-bottom:0.4em; margin-top:0;">About Me</h1>
<hr style="margin-top:0; margin-bottom:1.1em;">
<p style="font-size:1.21rem;">
  Hi, I’m <b>Pooja Sukhdeve</b> — a passionate Computer Science graduate student at Boston University, with 5+ years of hands-on experience in software development, web development, and data analytics. I specialize in building scalable, accessible, and user-centric solutions. I’m proficient in Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, and I’m skilled at transforming complex data into actionable insights using visualization tools like Tableau and SHAP.
</p>
<p style="font-size:1.19rem;">
  My journey includes developing accessible learning modules for visually impaired users, leading award-winning hackathon teams, and contributing to both academic research and innovative industry projects. I love collaborating across disciplines to solve real-world problems with code and data.
</p>






 ## Data Analytics & Visualization Unlock actionable insights from complex data.

Data wrangling & cleaning
Predictive modeling
Dashboards & visualization



 ## Software & Web Development Robust web & backend solutions

Full-stack dev
Responsive UI/UX
API integration



 ## Accessibility & Inclusive Design Software Engineering

WCAG compliance
Custom inclusive tools
Accessibility consultation








Leveraged machine learning (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting) to analyze exoplanet datasets. Achieved 75% model accuracy and used SHAP for interpretable AI, revealing the key features behind exoplanet detection.
Impact: Balanced accuracy with interpretability to support scientific discovery.
  Python    Jupyter    Pandas    scikit-learn    SHAP 





Analyzed Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) data to predict disease risk and optimize health insurance strategies. Employed models like Random Forest and KNN (best accuracy: 84.3%) and used SHAP values for model transparency.
Impact: Provided actionable health risk insights to support healthcare decision-making.



Figure 1: Footfall at pharmacies and grocery stores, for selected countries





Figure 2: Timeline of ‘Stay At Home’ restrictions, by country


  Python    Jupyter    Pandas    scikit-learn    SHAP 





Built a Tableau dashboard visualizing Netflix’s global content, genre trends, and maturity ratings. Highlighted U.S. dominance, movie-to-series ratio, and the evolution of content diversity since 2015.
Impact: Enabled data-driven understanding of streaming content trends for business and consumers.
  Tableau    Python    Pandas 





Developed an interactive visualization tool to help visually impaired users understand data structures like lists and sets in Python. This tool is part of a larger inclusive Python book project.
Impact: Advanced accessibility in programming education.
  Python    Jupyter    HTML5 






Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, Java, PHP


Web Development: Node.js, React, Angular, jQuery, Bootstrap, API Integration, Git, Responsive Design


Data Visualization & Analytics: Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Pandas, NumPy, SHAP, Excel


Data Engineering & Tools: OpenCV, Spark Apache, AWS


Other Tools: GitHub, Outlook, Android SDK







Interested in collaborating or want to connect? Feel free to reach out by email or connect on LinkedIn!



Email: poojasukhdeve06@gmail.com


GitHub: Your GitHub


LinkedIn: Your LinkedIn
